# RFQ – 10 Laptop Computers

**Description:**
Procure 10 units of the model XYZ‑Pro laptops with 16GB RAM, 512GB SSD, and Windows 11 Pro. Delivery required within 30 days of order confirmation.

**Quantity:** 10 units
**Delivery Date:** 2025‑02‑15

**Target Vendors:**
- TechSupply Co (V001)
- ComputeWorld (V002)
- GlobalTech (V003)

**Compliance Rules:**
- Spend limit: $15,000
- Green procurement required

Please provide your best price and delivery terms by 2025‑01‑25.
The RFQ has been generated and passes all compliance checks. I’ll now email the document to the three vendors with a personalized greeting for each.

arguments.subject: Request for Quotation – 10 Laptop Computers
arguments.body:
Dear **TechSupply Co**,

We appreciated your on‑time delivery and high‑quality service on our last order of networking equipment. Please find attached the RFQ for 10 XYZ‑Pro laptops.

Dear **ComputeWorld**,

Your competitive pricing and excellent technical support have been valuable to us. Attached is the RFQ for 10 XYZ‑Pro laptops.

Dear **GlobalTech**,

We were impressed with your sustainability initiatives and reliable supply chain. Please review the attached RFQ for 10 XYZ‑Pro laptops.

Kind regards,
Procurement Team
Acme Corp
